评论概述: Gen Z gateway drug to now trending fashion
评论详情: As a 28 year old millennial who loves fashion, it was a bit off putting to see what new trends are coming in. So when I saw this, it did peak my curiosity and I feel like I can see the potential of Gen Z fashion. I really enjoyed this shirt and I appreciate the nostalgic analog feel it has. It has some weight to it making it feel high quality to., (for $35 to $40 I’d like to think it would be lmao) Personally, I also appreciate the muted tones as it lens itself to a modern take of classic 90s as well. I went ahead and got another shirt and let’s just say my spark of curiosity with Gen Z fashion has been increased.

I think it's cool.  I like it.  Nice color, the lady feels a bit scandalous cause her eyes are covered with text, but it isn't scandalous at all, so I think it works to draw people's attention who want to figure out what's going on in the scene, but the fun thing is that it's just a very random scene that doesn't make sense even if you do spend time to closely investigating it.  The shirt does feel vintage, like the old school hefty hanes t-shirts that were thick cotton.  The screen printing seems substantial/sturdy but is as flexible as the shirt is.  It fits like a 90's shirt does, regular, not fitted whatsoever.  The sleeves are slightly longer like 90's shirts were.  I ordered a Large.  I'm thin, 6'1 around 150 pounds and it fits me well. (*larger than modern shirts though)I read in the description that the shirt's text says "I like you."  We'll............ I like you too T-shirt.  Go for it.
It’s a good shirt and doesn’t ruin after washes, one thing is the print on the shirt looks kind of pixelated but, it’s still very cute.

评论概述: Soft cool cotton T-Shirt, interesting style
评论详情: This review is for the Aelfric Eden Men's Character Graphic Oversize Shirts O-Neck Hipster Vintage Summer T-shirt Short Sleeve Loose Casual Tee. The Aelfric Eden Men's Character Shirt is very fashionable and hip. The T-Shirt is plenty roomy, but fits well, cool soft cotton feel. The Japanese means, “I like you”, and the T-Shirt features a young lady on it. Overall, nice fit, comfortable, cool, and interesting style, casual wear.
It looks exactly like in the picture It also fits

I love this shirt!  The design is beautiful and I always get compliments when I wear it.  This is a Japanese streetwear shirt, so the sleeves hit at the elbows and the sizing runs a bit small.  Size up one or two times if you're used to American sizing and want a looser fit, for sure.

This is a neat t-shirt.  I picked it up for my nephew who just turned 13.  I purchased him a medium.  It is a little big on him, but he will grow into it.  It is, though, an oversized shirt.  The shirt is well-made, and the graphic is well-done.  It is a medium weight shirt (thicker than normal t-shirts).  It can withstand wear and tear (and lots of washings).  This is a cool t-shirt that appeals to the younger set.

The shirt does look exactly like the picture and nice print quality. The shirt is oversized which is one of the reasons I bought it. It is a bit pricey to be honest but the quality is good and its a nice looking shirt.

I bought a large and it is a little big on me but I like wearing oversized shirts, for reference I'm 5'11 and it goes a couple inches below my waist. The shirt is cute and I like the cool graphic on it. The shirt is comfortable to wear and the stenciling was well done, and didn't fade at all after my initial wash. Overall I recommend it if you like the visual graphic of the shirt!

I recently came across the Aelfric Eden IDEVERRAY Mont.March t-shirt and as a guy who purchases hats and shirts while in Japan, this cotton t-shirt caught my eye because it's almost '90s or 2000s retro.  With the Hiragana of sukidesu (I like it) and showcasing a hand/shoulder bag that is often seen on a Japanese fashion magazine, I found it to be pretty cool.  For the most part, I dig the overall look of the shirt.  Fit to size, the Aelfric Eden IDEVERRAY Mont.March T-Shirt is recommended.

I bought this after reading that all of the other buyers shirts were too small, so I bought a medium knowing it should fit. It didn’t, it was way to big and must of been the wrong size. I will be returning and not be repurchasing. Just my experience.
